lexUnit.name: guilty.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having or showing a feeling of guilt

sentence.text: ` I feel tremendously guilty about what we did to Shaun .
Perhaps you felt guilty about ignoring a charity collection , and so decided to punish yourself ?
I felt guilty for challenging his motives and , even though a tiny corner of my mind was hearing an imaginary Ellen scoff at my naïvety , I believed the senator 's sudden and passionate sincerity .
` I 'm not feeling guilty about the fluke at all , " joked the 28-year-old Liverpudlian .
I did not like the accusation of naïvety , preferring to believe that I was an honest man who found it hard to imagine how other people could live with a guilty conscience .
` He had a tremendously guilty conscience about his desires . "
` Oh , is it you , Mr Boldwood ? " she said , with a guilty blush .
He nodded his satisfaction , and , to Ronni 's chagrin , a guilty blush touched her cheeks .
George watched Elaine 's guilty expression and felt the laughter threatening again .
Christmas in her nice , cheerful flat , with her gay company and no empty hours to fill , no guilty feeling about letting Christmas pass without recognition …
Then , if you feel tired or experience any withdrawal symptoms , you can go off to rest without any guilty feelings of having let others down .
It gave her an incredibly guilty feeling , as if she was a nuisance and should be away from here and not causing so much trouble .
See that stuffed bag in his hand and that guilty look on his face ?
I was terrified she might see the guilty look in my eyes for I am the man who lost the English Calais .
The two women exchanged guilty looks .
Alan 's term began again on January 20th , and he returned to university with a guilty sense of relief .
Guilty persons got a sense of inevitability , a knowledge that sooner or later he would come to the truth , then he 'd put a heavy hand on their shoulder and take them away .
` I 've even forgotten all about school , " she added with a guilty smile .
Feeling flustered and guilty that I had departed from my normal custom of never working on a pupil 's painting , I foolishly replied " Yes " .
Her mother had brought her up in the strict religion of the Mormon church , which made her very guilty about having sex .
There 's no need to look guilty about being frightened .
I skulked around the rails of haute couture feeling guilty for fingering fabric and scrutinising seams , but it 's a habit I ca n't break .
She went there , guilty at having crept away .
She had n't missed the way Ace 's hands shook , and the slight guilty lowering of her head as she glanced at Petion .
Whenever her family had been mentioned she looked as guilty as hell .
